about_the_game:
"Freeman: The Resistance is an sci-fi space exploration game, where you are a key member of the resistance battling the Coalition.

Your role is pivotal in undertaking vital missions , mastering the strategy of looting, and recapturing territories under enemy control.

Uncover dark secrets and form alliances with factions as you progress in this mysterious story.



As you navigate through this conflict, you are also granted the freedom to explore diverse planets across different galaxies, each offering its own set of challenges and opportunities. The vastness of space is your arena, and your decisions will shape the destiny of the universe.

Key features


Explore a mysterious world
Untangle the mysteries of this world as you uncover secrets in your journey through vast space.
  • Navigate and take part in crucial missions
  • Perfect the art of tactical looting and scavenging
  • Retaking areas under enemy hold



Collect resources
Collecting resources, essential for advancement and survival, can be achieved through the innovative use of a gravity gun or a mining robot.
  • Scouring diverse biomes for unique materials
  • Utilizing gathered resources for crafting essential tools and weapons
  • Upgrading your base, vehicles and equipment to withstand harsh environments and enemies
  • Trading resources with allies and traders for rare items and information
  • Implementing advanced technologies to locate and extract valuable resources from hard-to-reach places



Are you ready to embrace your heroic destiny, confront your own flesh and blood, and rewrite the future of the cosmos? The fate of the galaxy awaits in "Freeman" – the ultimate sci-fi gaming experience!

"Freeman: The Resistance" grants you the freedom to chart your own path, making every decision count as you strive to bring down the Corporation and restore harmony to the universe. Your actions will shape the destiny of the galaxy itself.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
